name: Tile/Combo Image Capture
author: Emily
info: Captures png images of all tiles and combos in a quest, in csets 0-11
description: Captures png images of all tiles and combos in a quest, in csets 0-11
setup: Compile the script (requires only "std.zh")Assign to global "Slot 2" (Active)Run the quest; it will lag heavily for a bit, then send you back to the title screen.Check "ZC Folder/files/[quest name]/", you will see 24 png files. Done.This isn't meant for use in finished quests, but simply as a tileset sampling tool, perfect for showcasing an entire tileset in a few images.
